title: Spider-Man PC Review Round Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.10.22
description:
Go to http://chime.com/KFGAMES to get started with Chime today.

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 20% off your first order plus free shipping.

Blessing and Greg talk about that Splatoon 3 Nintendo Direct, PS Plus Premium's latest update, and review round ups for Cult of The Lamb and Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered PC.

Time Stamps -

00:08:15 - Housekeeping
Our review of Cult of The Lamb is up right now as a Kinda Funny Gamescast! You can watch that right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and listen on podcast services around the globe.
And a new episode of the Kinda Funny Xcast is up, all about speculating Elden Ring coming to Game Pass, what games should have the Nemesis System, and more! You can check it out now on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
Are you ready to rumble?  Friday, we're doing a sponsored Rumbleverse stream with a buncha guests from Iron Galaxy to talk about the launch of their brawler royale! Come play with Greg and Mike in private Kinda Funny matches after KFGD at 11 am PT!
